sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Grid, Form, Segment, Icon, Button, Header, Message} from 'semantic-ui-react'
import Link from 'react-router-dom'

class Login extends React.Component {
    render() {
        return (
            <Grid textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" className="app">
                <Grid.Column style={{maxWidth: 450}}>
                    <Header as="h2" icon color="orange" textAlign="center">
                        Login
                        <Icon name="puzzle piece" color="orange"></Icon>
                    </Header>
                    <Form size="large" onSubmit={this.handleSubmit}>
                        <Segment stacked>
                            <Form.Input fluid name="email" icon="mail" iconPosition="left"
                            placeholder="Email address" type="text" />
                            <Form.Input fluid name="password" icon="key" iconPosition="left"
                            placeholder="Password" type="password" />
                            <Button fluid size="large" color="orange">Login</Button>
                        </Segment>

                    </Form>
                </Grid.Column>
            </Grid>
        );
    }
}

export default Login;
